description:
Recca Hanabishi is the son of a fireworks maker, and a ninja. Or at least, he thinks he is! Since he was young, he`s always felt a deep connection to those shadowy warriors from the past. But when the past comes calling, Recca`s in for a fiery awakening.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Princess and the Ninja: Awakening of the Power!!
姫と忍者 めざめた力!!
